players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Alice was such a valuable member of our group. We need to think carefully about who could have done this - it has to be one of us three remaining."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, this is crucial information. Charlie, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
Diana: "Charlie, do you have any evidence or reason why we shouldn't believe Bob's claim?"
You: "Charlie is trying to deflect and buy time. We can't let the mafia manipulate us any longer. Diana, let's make the right choice and vote Charlie out now."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
